mapper.insert: insert into member (ID, ACCOUNT, BIRTH, EMAIL, GENDER, NAME, PASSWORD, TEL, GRADE) values (#{id}, #{account}, sysdate, #{email}, #{gender}, #{name}, #{password}, #{tel}, 'bronze')

insert into talent (talent_no, seller_Id, upper_category_no, lower_category_no, main_Img, title, content, bamboo, sale_bamboo, summary, status, view_count, reg_Date) values (#{talentNo}, #{sellerId}, #{upperCategoryNo}, #{lowerCategoryNo}, #{mainImg}, #{title}, #{content}, #{bamboo}, #{saleBamboo}, #{summary}, #{status}, #{viewCount}, sysdate)
insert into bamboo_use (purchase_No, buyer_Id, talent_No, purchase_Date, use_Bamboo) values (#{purchaseNo}, #{buyerId}, #{talentNo}, sysdate, #{useBamboo})
insert into talent_refund (purchase_No, status, issue, submit_Date, approve_Date, refund_Bamboo) values (#{purchaseNo}, #{status}, #{issue}, sysdate, sysdate, #{refundBamboo})
